author: gurukamath
content: I won’t be able to make it to today’s sync call

author: samwilsn
content:
Spec Sync #54
 - <@689161464829050960> tried a bunch of things to speed up the doc generation process, so far the only noticeable effect has been from parallelizing `rstdiff`. Also has the new `modexp` implemented, but is working on tests.
 - <@243183686562873344> started working on the berlin changes, applied to talk at devcon, fixing performance in the optimized state. Targeting one second block processing time.
 - <@886437394675548190> cleaned up some diffs between forks,  still looking at those, and wrote an introduction for the specs.
